summary: Diving to save a camera from a fall down a flight of stairs, high school junior Naomi Sukuse wakes with no memory of the last four years. Naomi must remember who she was and figure out who ... See full summary »
cast: Maki Horikita|Ken'ichi Matsuyama|Yûya Tegoshi|Anton Yelchin|Anri Chomentowska|Emma Roberts|Kylee|Mirei Kiritani|Misa Shimizu|Karen Kirishima|Atsuro Watabe|Cameron Duncan|Matsumi Fuku|Loic Garnier|Yukiko Hattori|Shinya Himeda|Casper Johansson|Yoriko Kamimura|Tomotaka Kanzaki|Aily Kei|Haruki Kimura|Reika Kirishima|Takeshi Kubo|Kate Miller|Ian Moore|Toshie Nagamine|David Neale|Ai Ozaki|Yui Ozaki|Reira|Arthur Rempel|Shin Shimizu|Julia Sniegowski|Miki Takahashi|Michelle Take|Yuki Takenaka|Katherine Torbov|Umi Yamano
title: Memoirs of a Teenage Amnesiac
